member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.DatabasePropertyType.UpdateName
member.summary: The name of the field used when data in the field is updated to the remote table. By default, the remote table field name.Read/write.

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.DatabasePropertyType.FetchMemo
member.summary: Contains true (.T.) (default) if memo and general fields are fetched with the view results; otherwise, contains false (.F.).

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.DatabasePropertyType.FetchSize
member.summary: Contains the number of records fetched at a time from the remote tables. The default is 100 records. Setting FetchSize to –1 retrieves the complete result set, limited by the MaxRecords setting

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.DatabasePropertyType.KeyField
member.summary: Contains True (.T.) if the field is specified in an index key expression; otherwise, contains False (.F.). (L)

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.DatabasePropertyType.MaxRecords
member.summary: The maximum number of records fetched when result sets are returned. (N) The default is – 1 (all rows are returned). A value of 0 specifies that the view is executed but no results are fetched.

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.DatabasePropertyType.ShareConnection
member.summary: Contains true (.T.) if the view can share its connection handle with other connections; otherwise, contains false (.F.).

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.DatabasePropertyType.SourceType
member.summary: The view source. (N) SourceType may assume the following values: 1 - The view uses local tables.2 - The view uses remote tables.

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.DatabasePropertyType.SQL
member.summary: The SQL statement executed when the view is opened.(C)

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.DatabasePropertyType.Tables
member.summary: A comma-delimited list of the names of the tables.(C)

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.DatabasePropertyType.SendUpdates
member.summary: Contains true (.T.) if a SQL update query is sent to update remote tables; otherwise, contains false (.F.) (default).

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.DatabasePropertyType.Updatable
member.summary: Contains True (.T.) if the field can be updated; otherwise, contains False (.F.).

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.DatabasePropertyType.UpdateType
member.summary: The update type. Valid values are: 1 or DB_UPDATE (from Foxpro.h). The old data is updated with the new data (default). 2 or DB_DELETEINSERT (from Foxpro.h). The old data is deleted and the new data is inserted.

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.DatabasePropertyType.UseMemoSize
member.summary: The minimum size (in bytes) for which result columns are returned in memo fields. For example, if the width of a column result is greater than the value of UseMemoSize, the column result is stored in a memo field. UseMemoSize may vary from 1 to 255; the default value is 255.

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.DatabasePropertyType.WhereType
member.summary: The WHERE clause for updates to remote tables.WhereType may assume the following values: 1 or DB_KEY , 2 or DB_KEYANDUPDATABLE, 3 or DB_KEYANDMODIFIED and 4 or DB_KEYANDTIMESTAMP

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.DatabasePropertyType.DispWarnings
member.summary: Contains a numeric value that determines when the ODBC Login dialog box is displayed.

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.DatabasePropertyType.IdleTimeout
member.summary: The idle timeout interval in minutes. Timeout is checked no more than once per minute, therefore it is possible that active connections might deactivate one or two minutes later after the specified time interval has elapsed. The default value is 0 (wait indefinitely).

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.DatabasePropertyType.QueryTimeOut
member.summary: The query timeout interval in seconds. The default value is 0 (wait indefinitely).

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.DatabasePropertyType.Password

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.DatabasePropertyType.UserId

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.DatabasePropertyType.WaitTime
member.summary: The amount of time in milliseconds that elapses before Visual FoxPro checks whether the SQL statement has completed executing.

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.DatabasePropertyType.TimeStamp
member.summary: Timestamp (internal)

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.DatabasePropertyType.DataType
member.summary: The data type for a field in a view. Initially set to the data type for the field in the data source.

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.DatabasePropertyType.PacketSize
member.summary: The size of the network packet used by the connection. Adjusting this value can improve performance. The default value is 4096 bytes (4K).

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.DatabasePropertyType.Database
member.summary: The name of the server database specified with the DATABASE clause in the CREATE CONNECTION command or in the Connection Designer.

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.DatabasePropertyType.Prepared
member.summary: Contains True (.T.) if SQL statements are prepared for subsequent REQUERY( ) function calls. REQUERY( ) is used to retrieve data again for a SQL view. See SQLPREPARE( ) for additional information about preparing SQL statements. The default is false (.F.).

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.DatabasePropertyType.CompareMemo
member.summary: Contains true (.T.) (default) if memo fields (of type Memo, General, or Picture, or, for remote views, type Timestamp) are included in the WHERE clause for updates; otherwise, contains false (.F.).Read/write.

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.DatabasePropertyType.FetchAsNeeded
member.summary: If True (.T.), data is fetched only when needed, such as when record pointer moves to a row that has not been fetched. If False (.F.), additional data is fetched during idle time. (Default)

member.name: T:XSharp.RDD.SQLProperty
member.summary: Enum that matches the various FoxPro Sql properties, used in SqlGetProp() and SqlSetProp()

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.SQLProperty.Asynchronous
member.summary: Specifies whether result sets are returned synchronously.

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.SQLProperty.BatchMode
member.summary: Specifies whether SqlExec( ) returns result sets all at once (True (.T.), the default), or individually with SqlMoreResults( ) (False (.F.)).

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.SQLProperty.ConnectBusy
member.summary: Contains True (.T.) if a shared connection is busy; otherwise contains False (.F.).

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.SQLProperty.ConnectString
member.summary: The login connection string.

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.SQLProperty.ConnectTimeOut
member.summary: Specifies the time to wait (in seconds) before returning a connection time-out error. If you specify 0, the wait is indefinite and a time-out error is never returned. ConnectTimeOut can be 0 to 600. The default is 15.

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.SQLProperty.DataSource
member.summary: The name of the data source as defined in the ODBC.INI file.

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.SQLProperty.DisconnectRollback
member.summary: Specifies if a pending transaction is committed or rolled back when SqlDisconnect( ) is called for the last connection handle.

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.SQLProperty.DispLogin
member.summary: Contains a numeric value that determines when the ODBC Login dialog box is displayed.

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.SQLProperty.DispWarnings
member.summary: Specifies if error messages are displayed (True (.T.)) or are not displayed (False (.F.), the default).

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.SQLProperty.IdleTimeout
member.summary: The idle timeout interval in minutes. Active connections are deactivated after the specified time interval. The default value is 0 (wait indefinitely).

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.SQLProperty.NativeCommand
member.summary: The native commandtext in the SQLStatement object.

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.SQLProperty.ODBChdbc
member.summary: The internal ODBC connection, which may be used by external code to call ODBC.

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.SQLProperty.ODBChstmt
member.summary: The internal ODBC statement , which may be used by external code to call ODBC.

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.SQLProperty.PacketSize
member.summary: The size of the network packet used by the connection. Adjusting this value can improve performance. The default value is 4096 bytes (4K).

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.SQLProperty.Password
member.summary: The connection password.

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.SQLProperty.QueryTimeOut
member.summary: Specifies the time to wait (in seconds) before returning a general time-out error. If you specify 0 (the default), the wait is indefinite and a time-out error is never returned. QueryTimeOut can be 0 to 600.

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.SQLProperty.Shared
member.summary: Specifies whether the underlying connection is a shared connection (True (.T.)), or not (False (.F.)).

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.SQLProperty.Transactions
member.summary: Contains a numeric value that determines how the connection manages transactions on the remote table.

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.SQLProperty.UserId
member.summary: The user identification.

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.SQLProperty.WaitTime
member.summary: The amount of time in milliseconds that elapses before Visual FoxPro checks if the SQL statement has completed executing. The default is 100 milliseconds.

member.name: T:XSharp.RDD.Enums.DbFieldInfo
member.summary: This enum specifies the various values that the FieldInfo method for the IRDD interface accepts.

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.Enums.DbFieldInfo.DBS_NAME
member.summary: Returns the name of the field.

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.Enums.DbFieldInfo.DBS_TYPE
member.summary: Returns the data type of the field. This is a single character string such as 'C' or 'N'.

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.Enums.DbFieldInfo.DBS_LEN
member.summary: Returns the length of the field.

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.Enums.DbFieldInfo.DBS_DEC
member.summary: Returns the number of decimal places for the field.

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.Enums.DbFieldInfo.DBS_ALIAS
member.summary: Returns and optionally changes an alternate name (or alias) by which a field can be referenced (by default, same as DBS_NAME).

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.Enums.DbFieldInfo.DBS_FLAGS
member.summary: Returns the field flags for a field (a value from the DBFFieldFlags enum)

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.Enums.DbFieldInfo.DBS_ISNULL
member.summary: Harbour extension: Returns the flag that indicates if a field is Nullable.

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.Enums.DbFieldInfo.DBS_COUNTER
member.summary: Harbour extension: Returns the next available value for autoincrement fields.

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.Enums.DbFieldInfo.DBS_STEP
member.summary: Harbour extension: Returns the step value for autoincrement fields.

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.Enums.DbFieldInfo.DBS_CAPTION
member.summary: Foxpro extension: Returns the field caption.

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.Enums.DbFieldInfo.DBS_COLUMNINFO
member.summary: VFP / SQL extension: Returns the object with the complete column information.

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.Enums.DbFieldInfo.DBS_DESCRIPTION
member.summary: VFP / SQL extension: Returns a string describing the object (the comment).

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.Enums.DbFieldInfo.DBS_BLANK
member.summary: X# Extension: returns a blank value for the field.

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.Enums.DbFieldInfo.DBS_BLOB_GET
member.summary: Gets a BLOB value.

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.Enums.DbFieldInfo.DBS_BLOB_TYPE
member.summary: Unlike memo fields maintained in .DBT files, BLOB files allow you to store many different types of data in memo fields. This returns type type of the BLOB as a single character string.

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.Enums.DbFieldInfo.DBS_BLOB_LEN
member.summary: Returns the length of the BLOB data in a memo field as an unsigned long integer.

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.Enums.DbFieldInfo.DBS_BLOB_POINTER
member.summary: Returns a numeric pointer to the BLOB data associated with a memo field.

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.Enums.DbFieldInfo.DBS_BLOB_DIRECT_TYPE
member.summary: Returns the type of data in a BLOB as an unsigned long integer, without referencing a particular memo field. With this constant, you must specify the BLOB using a numeric pointer obtained from BLOBDirectPut(), BLOBDirectImport(), or DBFieldInfo(DBS_BLOB_POINTER, <nFieldPos>).

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.Enums.DbFieldInfo.DBS_BLOB_DIRECT_LEN
member.summary: Returns the length of data in a BLOB as an unsigned long integer, without referencing a particular memo field. With this constant, you must specify the BLOB using a numeric pointer obtained from BLOBDirectPut(), BLOBDirectImport(), or DBFieldInfo(DBS_BLOB_POINTER, <nFieldPos>).

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.Enums.DbFieldInfo.DBS_STRUCT
member.summary: Return the RDD FieldInfo structure

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.Enums.DbFieldInfo.DBS_PROPERTIES
member.summary: Returns the number of properties defined for a field.

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.Enums.DbFieldInfo.DBS_USER
member.summary: Start of user defined FieldInfo values.

member.name: T:XSharp.RDD.Enums.DbNotificationType
member.summary: Enum that described the possible Notification messages that are sent to clients of Workareas

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.Enums.DbNotificationType.FileCreate
member.summary: This message is sent after a file was created. The Data parameter is the name of the file that was opened.

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.Enums.DbNotificationType.FileOpen
member.summary: This message is sent after a file was opened. The Data parameter is the name of the file that was opened.

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.Enums.DbNotificationType.FileClose
member.summary: This message is sent after a file is closed. The Data parameter is the name of the file that was closed.

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.Enums.DbNotificationType.IndexCreate
member.summary: This message is sent after an index was created. The Data parameter is the name of the file that was opened.

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.Enums.DbNotificationType.IndexDelete
member.summary: This message is sent after an index was deleted. The Data parameter is the name of the file that was opened.

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.Enums.DbNotificationType.IndexOpen
member.summary: This message is sent after an index was opened. The Data parameter is the name of the file that was opened.

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.Enums.DbNotificationType.IndexClose
member.summary: This message is sent after an index was closed. The Data parameter is the name of the file that was closed.

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.Enums.DbNotificationType.BeforeBulkOperation
member.summary: This message is sent before a bulk operation is started. The Data parameter is a description of the operation.

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.Enums.DbNotificationType.AfterBulkOperation
member.summary: This message is sent after a bulk operation was completed. The Data parameter is a description of the operation.

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.Enums.DbNotificationType.OrderChanged
member.summary: This message is sent after an order was changed. The Data parameter is the name of the new order.

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.Enums.DbNotificationType.BeforeFieldUpdate
member.summary: This message is sent before a field is updated The Data parameter is the fieldname of the field that was updated.

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.Enums.DbNotificationType.AfterFieldUpdate
member.summary: This message is sent after a field was updated The Data parameter is the fieldname of the field that was updated.

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.Enums.DbNotificationType.BeforeMove
member.summary: This message is sent before the record pointer is moved. The Data parameter indicates the reason for the move

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.Enums.DbNotificationType.AfterMove
member.summary: This message is sent after the record pointer was moved. The Data parameter indicates the reason for the move

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.Enums.DbNotificationType.RecordAppended
member.summary: This message is sent after a new record was appended. The Data parameter is the record number of the record.

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.Enums.DbNotificationType.AfterRecordDeleted
member.summary: This message is sent after a record was deleted. The Data parameter is the record number of the record.

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.Enums.DbNotificationType.RecordDeleted
member.summary: This message is sent after a record was deleted. The Data parameter is the record number of the record.

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.Enums.DbNotificationType.AfterRecordRecalled
member.summary: This message is sent after a record was recalled. The Data parameter is the record number of the record.

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.Enums.DbNotificationType.RecordRecalled
member.summary: This message is sent after a record was recalled. The Data parameter is the record number of the record.

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.Enums.DbNotificationType.RecordLocked
member.summary: This message is sent after a record was locked. The Data parameter is the record number of the record.

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.Enums.DbNotificationType.RecordUnLocked
member.summary: This message is sent after a record was unlocked. The Data parameter is the record number of the record.

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.Enums.DbNotificationType.FileCommit
member.summary: This message is sent after a Workarea was commited. The Data parameter is the file name of area.

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.Enums.DbNotificationType.BeforeRecordDeleted
member.summary: This message is sent before a record is deleted. The Data parameter is the record number of the record.

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.Enums.DbNotificationType.BeforeRecordRecalled
member.summary: This message is sent before a record is recalled. The Data parameter is the record number of the record.

member.name: F:XSharp.RDD.Enums.DbNotificationType.OperationFailed
member.summary: This message is sent after an operation failed. The Data parameter is the description of the operation.
